newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: PCIBank plans rights issue to hike capital.
newsitem.headline: PCIBank plans rights issue to hike capital.

text.p: Philippine Commercial International Bank (PCIBank) is planning to make a stock rights offering to boost its capital by 3.0 to 5.0 billion pesos pesos this year, PCIBank president Rafael Buenaventura said on Thursday.
"We probably will need a capital increase some time this year ... through a rights issue," Buenaventura told reporters.
He said the bank needs to upgrade its capital in order to stay competitive.
"A number of banks are planning to increase their capital in anticipation of a further increase in economic activities this year. We should be ready for that," he added.
At present, the bank's capital is at 18 billion pesos, the fourth biggest in the industry.
